mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, TO_CHAR(ness_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ness_date, TO_CHAR(created_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_date, type, content, status FROM lateness WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id} ORDER BY ness_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lateness ( employee_id, ness_date, created_date, type, content, status ) VALUES ( #{employee_id}, #{ness_date}, SYSDATE, #{type}, #{content}, #{status} )
mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, TO_CHAR(ness_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ness_date, TO_CHAR(created_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_date, type, content, status FROM lateness WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id} AND TO_CHAR(ness_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{ness_date}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lateness WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id} AND ness_date = #{ness_date}
